title: Legend position option
description: Add legend-position theme key supporting 'bottom' (current default), 'right', 'top', 'none'. Update chart-container and legend primitives to handle positioning.

title: Add donut progress (fitness rings)
description: Multi-segment circular progress indicator like Apple fitness rings. Each ring is a separate metric with its own color and value.

title: Add input validation to all charts
description: Guard against empty arrays, mismatched label/value counts, zero-length series, invalid ranges. Produce clear Typst assert messages instead of cryptic errors.

title: Phase 4: Tests, cleanup, and README update
description: Create tests/test-all.typ with compilation tests for every chart type and theme preset. Remove old root-level chart-*.typ, charting.typ, chart-demo.typ, and root JSON files. Update README with new structure, import paths, theme examples, package install instructions. Final verification.

title: Fix dark theme text colors
description: Dark theme sets background but axis labels, value labels, and titles remain black â€” invisible on dark bg. Add text-color, axis-label-color, value-label-color keys to theme system and wire them through all charts.

title: Fix division-by-zero crashes across all chart types
description: Critical: n==1 div/zero in line/area charts, max-val==0 in bar/gauge/progress-bars, val-range==0 in gauge and boxplot. Guard all division operations.

title: Add slope chart
description: Two vertical axes with lines connecting values. Shows changes/rankings between two periods.

title: Fix API inconsistencies and validation gaps
description: Medium: Remove unused horizontal param from bar-chart, add array-format validation in validate-simple-data and validate-scatter-data, fix format-number comma mode ignoring digits param, fix waterfall label position for negative totals, fix stacked-area max-val for negative series.

title: Add gantt chart
description: Timeline bar chart for project scheduling. Tasks with start/end dates, dependencies, milestones.

title: Add doc comments to all public functions
description: Add Typst doc comments to every exported function for IDE hover and typst doc generation.

title: Add data helper utilities
description: Add sort-data(), top-n(), aggregate() helpers so users don't need to wrangle arrays before charting. Work with both dict and array data formats.

title: Add funnel chart
description: Funnel/pipeline chart for conversion data. Trapezoid segments narrowing top to bottom with labels and values. Supports horizontal and vertical orientation.

title: Auto-scaling tick labels
description: When many categories on x-axis, labels overlap. Add rotation (45deg) when labels would collide, or skip every Nth label. Detect overlap based on label count vs available width.

title: Add sparkline chart type
description: Inline mini-charts for use in tables and text. Minimal: sparkline(values) renders a tiny line. Options: width, height, color, show-endpoint, fill-area.

title: Add lollipop chart
description: Bar chart variant with line+circle instead of filled bar. Cleaner for ranked data.

title: Add bullet chart
description: Compact gauge replacement by Stephen Few. Single measure vs target with qualitative ranges.

title: Add waterfall chart
description: Waterfall chart for financial/cumulative data. Shows running total with positive (green) and negative (red) segments, connecting lines between bars, and a total bar.

title: Add diverging bar chart
description: Horizontal bars going left/right from center axis. Survey results, sentiment, before/after.

title: Add box plot chart
description: Box-and-whisker plot for statistical distributions. Shows min, Q1, median, Q3, max. Support single and multi-series. Data format: array of (min, q1, median, q3, max) tuples.

title: Publish to Typst Universe
description: Final prep and submission to Typst Universe package registry. Verify typst.toml, add authors, test install flow.

title: Phase 1: Scaffold directory structure and move files
description: Create src/, src/primitives/, src/charts/, examples/, data/, tests/ directories. Create typst.toml. Move JSON to data/. Copy chart files to src/charts/ (drop chart- prefix). Create src/lib.typ and examples/demo.typ. Update .gitignore (add AGENTS.md). Verify typst compile examples/demo.typ succeeds.

title: Add treemap chart
description: Nested rectangles showing hierarchical data proportionally. Common for disk usage, budgets, portfolios.

title: Phase 3: Extract shared primitives and refactor charts
description: Create src/primitives/ files: title.typ, axes.typ, legend.typ, container.typ. Refactor each chart file to use primitives (order: bar, line, area, scatter, pie, radar, gauge, heatmap). Add show-grid and axis title support to all cartesian charts. Verify after each file.

title: Support relative widths (100%) in all charts
description: Charts crash with width:100% because relative lengths can't be compared with pt values. Need to resolve relative lengths to absolute before geometry calculations.

title: Add histogram chart with auto-binning
description: New chart type: histogram. Accept raw numeric array, auto-bin into buckets, render as bar chart with no gaps. Support custom bin count, min/max range, and density mode.

title: Phase 2: Create theme system and utilities
description: Create src/theme.typ with default-theme, resolve-theme(), get-color(), preset themes (minimal, dark, presentation, print). Create src/util.typ with normalize-data(), lerp-color(), heat-color(), clamp(), format-number(). Update all chart files to use theme system. Add theme: none param to every chart function. Verify compilation.

title: Add grouped+stacked bar combo chart
description: Combination of grouped and stacked bars - groups of stacked segments side by side.

title: Fix hardcoded colors bypassing theme system
description: Medium: white stroke in stacked-bar/pie, luma(180) in radar axes, luma(230) in progress-bars background. All should use theme values.

title: Add dual Y-axis support for line/bar charts
description: Allow two Y-axes (left and right) for overlaying series with different scales. Common dashboard pattern.

title: Add colorblind-safe accessible palette
description: Add themes.accessible preset using Okabe-Ito or similar colorblind-safe palette. 8 distinguishable colors for deuteranopia/protanopia/tritanopia.

title: Add sankey chart
description: Flow diagram showing quantities between stages. User flows, energy transfers, budget allocation.

title: Number formatting for axis labels
description: Wire format-number() through axis tick labels. Add comma separators for thousands (1,000), SI abbreviations (1.2k, 1.5M) as options. Add number-format key to theme: 'auto', 'comma', 'si', or none.

title: Chart annotations
description: Add ability to draw reference lines (horizontal/vertical), highlight regions, and text annotations on cartesian charts. API: annotations parameter accepting array of annotation dicts.
